title: Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr. Announce 2025 Summer Tour
description: The co-headliners will play 18 U.S. cities in July and August, including stops in Brooklyn, Boston, Nashville, Detroit, and more
author: Madison Bloom
excerpt: The co-headliners will play 18 U.S. cities in July and August, including stops in Brooklyn, Boston, Nashville, Detroit, and more
text: Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr. have announced a joint tour kicking off this summer. They’ll get things rolling July 15 in Deerfield, Massachusetts (Dinosaur Jr.’s home state), before winding through select cities like Brooklyn, Boston, Nashville, Detroit, Chicago, Boise, and more. The co-headliners will wrap things up on August 8 in Seattle. Check out Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr.’s full schedule below.Snail Mail mastermind Lindsey Jordan released her most recent LP Valentine in 2021. Since then, she has shared select demos from the album, collected in a 2023 EP. That same year, she teamed up with Sonic Youth’s Thurston Moore to cover Lou Reed’s Transformer classic “Satellite of Love” for a Fender campaign.Dinosaur Jr. also issued a new album in 2021 titled Sweep It Into Space, which featured co-production from Kurt Vile. Last year, the rock stalwarts reissued their 2009 album Farm.Revisit Pitchfork’s 2021 interview “Snail Mail Can’t Help But Confess.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Snail Mail & Dinosaur Jr. - Summer 2025 TourSnail Mail and Dinosaur Jr. Tour:07-15 Deerfield, MA - Tree House Brewing07-17 Brooklyn, NY - BRIC Celebrate Brooklyn!07-18 Boston, MA - Roadrunner07-19 Asbury Park, NJ - Stone Pony Summer Stage07-20 Silver Spring, MD - The Fillmore07-22 Atlanta, GA - Tabernacle07-24 Nashville, TN - The Pinnacle07-25 Cincinnati, OH - The Andrew J Brady Music Center07-26 Detroit, MI - Royal Oak Music Theatre07-27 Grand Rapids, MI - Venue TBC07-29 Chicago, IL - The Salt Shed07-30 Minneapolis, MN - The Fillmore07-31 Milwaukee, WI - Turner Hall Ballroom08-02 Billings, MT - Pub Station08-04 Boise, ID - Treefort Music Hall08-06 Spokane, WA - Knitting Factory08-07 Portland, OR - Pioneer Courthouse Square08-08 Seattle, WA - Venue TBC
html:
Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr. have announced a joint tour kicking off this summer. They’ll get things rolling July 15 in Deerfield, Massachusetts (Dinosaur Jr.’s home state), before winding through select cities like Brooklyn, Boston, Nashville, Detroit, Chicago, Boise, and more. The co-headliners will wrap things up on August 8 in Seattle. Check out Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr.’s full schedule below.

Snail Mail mastermind Lindsey Jordan released her most recent LP Valentine in 2021. Since then, she has shared select demos from the album, collected in a 2023 EP. That same year, she teamed up with Sonic Youth’s Thurston Moore to cover Lou Reed’s Transformer classic “Satellite of Love” for a Fender campaign.

Dinosaur Jr. also issued a new album in 2021 titled Sweep It Into Space, which featured co-production from Kurt Vile. Last year, the rock stalwarts reissued their 2009 album Farm.

Revisit Pitchfork’s 2021 interview “Snail Mail Can’t Help But Confess.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Snail Mail & Dinosaur Jr. - Summer 2025 Tour

Snail Mail and Dinosaur Jr. Tour:

07-15 Deerfield, MA - Tree House Brewing
07-17 Brooklyn, NY - BRIC Celebrate Brooklyn!
07-18 Boston, MA - Roadrunner
07-19 Asbury Park, NJ - Stone Pony Summer Stage
07-20 Silver Spring, MD - The Fillmore
07-22 Atlanta, GA - Tabernacle
07-24 Nashville, TN - The Pinnacle
07-25 Cincinnati, OH - The Andrew J Brady Music Center
07-26 Detroit, MI - Royal Oak Music Theatre
07-27 Grand Rapids, MI - Venue TBC
07-29 Chicago, IL - The Salt Shed
07-30 Minneapolis, MN - The Fillmore
07-31 Milwaukee, WI - Turner Hall Ballroom
08-02 Billings, MT - Pub Station
08-04 Boise, ID - Treefort Music Hall
08-06 Spokane, WA - Knitting Factory
08-07 Portland, OR - Pioneer Courthouse Square
08-08 Seattle, WA - Venue TBC
